languages.text: "Лорд-капитан считает, что Мастер ван Калокс недостаточно близко контактирует с моей персоной. Почему бы не исправить это в более уединенной обстановке — прямо сейчас?"

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан считает, что Мастер ван Калокс недостаточно близко контактирует с моей персоной. Почему бы не исправить это в более уединенной обстановке — прямо сейчас?"

languages.text: "The Lord Captain believes that Master van Calox has had insufficiently close contact with my person. Why don't we remedy that in a more private setting — right now?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан считает, что Мастер ван Калокс недостаточно близко контактирует с моей персоной. Почему бы не исправить это в более уединенной обстановке — прямо сейчас?"

traits.locale_text: "The Lord Captain believes that Master van Calox has had insufficiently close contact with my person. Why don't we remedy that in a more private setting — right now?"
"The Lord Captain believes that Master van Calox has had insufficiently close contact with my person. Why don't we remedy that in a more private setting — right now?"
"The Lord Captain believes that Master van Calox has had insufficiently close contact with my person. Why don't we remedy that in a more private setting — right now?"
"The Lord Captain believes that Master van Calox has had insufficiently close contact with my person. Why don't we remedy that in a more private setting — right now?"

languages.text: “你的领主舰长认为，冯·卡洛克斯大师与我的接触还不够密切。不如咱们去个更私密的地方，来解决这个问题吧？就现在，怎么样？”
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain believes that Master van Calox has had insufficiently close contact with my person. Why don't we remedy that in a more private setting — right now?"

traits.locale_text: “你的领主舰长认为，冯·卡洛克斯大师与我的接触还不够密切。不如咱们去个更私密的地方，来解决这个问题吧？就现在，怎么样？”

languages.text: «Lo que la Lord Capitán cree es que el maestro van Calox ha mantenido un contacto insuficientemente cercano con su persona. ¿Podríamos remediarlo en un entorno más privado... ahora mismo?».
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain believes that Master van Calox has had insufficiently close contact with my person. Why don't we remedy that in a more private setting — right now?"

traits.locale_text: «Lo que la Lord Capitán cree es que el maestro van Calox ha mantenido un contacto insuficientemente cercano con su persona. ¿Podríamos remediarlo en un entorno más privado... ahora mismo?».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンは、マスター・ヴァン・カロックスとの接触が不十分だと考えているんだ。もっとプライベートな場で、もう少し改善しないか…今すぐに」
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain believes that Master van Calox has had insufficiently close contact with my person. Why don't we remedy that in a more private setting — right now?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンは、マスター・ヴァン・カロックスとの接触が不十分だと考えているんだ。もっとプライベートな場で、もう少し改善しないか…今すぐに」

languages.text: « La seigneure-capitaine considère que le maître van Calox n'a pas bénéficié d'un contact suffisamment étroit avec sa personne. Pourquoi ne pas y remédier en privé dès maintenant ? »
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain believes that Master van Calox has had insufficiently close contact with my person. Why don't we remedy that in a more private setting — right now?"

traits.locale_text: « La seigneure-capitaine considère que le maître van Calox n'a pas bénéficié d'un contact suffisamment étroit avec sa personne. Pourquoi ne pas y remédier en privé dès maintenant ? »

languages.text: "Der Lord Captain findet, dass Meister van Calox eigentlich gar nicht genug engen Kontakt zu meiner Person hatte. Warum gehen wir das Ganze in einem privateren Rahmen nicht gleich an?"
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain believes that Master van Calox has had insufficiently close contact with my person. Why don't we remedy that in a more private setting — right now?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Lord Captain findet, dass Meister van Calox eigentlich gar nicht genug engen Kontakt zu meiner Person hatte. Warum gehen wir das Ganze in einem privateren Rahmen nicht gleich an?"

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Üstat van Calox'un kendisiyle yeteri kadar yakın bir ilişki kurmadığını düşünüyor. Neden bu sorunu baş başa kalabileceğimiz bir ortamda, şu anda çözmüyoruz?"
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain believes that Master van Calox has had insufficiently close contact with my person. Why don't we remedy that in a more private setting — right now?"
